name: Zwei: The Arges Adventure
description: Filterless fashionista Pipiro and poindextrous punster Pokkle are ordinary step-siblings facing an ordinary day in their ordinary little burg...until a grand theft macguffin occurs and they decide to become unlikely heroes for cash and glory (in that order). This goes about as well as youâ€™d expect.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 2GHz Single core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
